study_type: clinical trial, observational study, systematic review, meta-analysis, other
inclusion_criteria: 1. Studies assessing the impact of modern digital technologies on diabetes medication adherence.
2. Human subjects: Adult or pediatric patients with chronic conditions requiring medication adherence (excluding animal studies).
4. The study is specifically focused on diabetic patients.
exclusion_criteria: 1. Studies on adherence to treatments unrelated to medication.
3. Studies focused on mental health that do not address medication adherence.
